about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Landmark Immigration Consultants Limited is engaged in the business of Global Consultancy Services.

The company offers Global Education Consultancy for students seeking to study abroad and Immigration Consultancy for visas, tourism, business, and permanent residency, primarily in Canada.

The company offers global education and immigration consultancy through 9 fully equipped branches, partnering with over 30 Canadian institutions, with dedicated consultants and training facilities. Company has entered into 3 Franchise Agreements at Jammu, Jind, and Karnal.

Services:

  • Global Education Consultancy Services: Education Consultancy, Education Loan Guidance, and Scholarships, Admission application Formalities, Training for Language Proficiency Tests, Study/Schooling Visa.
  • Immigration Consultancy Services: Tourist Visa/Business Visa, Permanent Residency Visa.

As of September 30, 2024, the company has around 128 employees on a payroll basis.

Competitive Strengths:

  • One-Stop Solution for Visa Consultancy Services
  • Certifications and appointments by reputed universities obtained by Promoter and Company
  • Dedicated Team of Counsellors
  • Experience of the Promoters and senior management team.

faqs.question: What is the Landmark Immigration IPO?
faqs.answer:
Landmark Immigration IPO is a SME IPO of 5600000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹40.32 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹72 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on January 16, 2025, and closes on January 20, 2025.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Landmark Immigration IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Landmark Immigration IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Landmark Immigration IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Landmark Immigration IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Landmark Immigration IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Landmark Immigration IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Landmark Immigration IPO opens on January 16, 2025 and closes on January 20, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Landmark Immigration IPO?
faqs.answer: Landmark Immigration IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,15,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Landmark Immigration IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Landmark Immigration IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Landmark Immigration IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Landmark Immigration IPO will be done on Tuesday, January 21, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, January 22, 2025. Check the Landmark Immigration IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Landmark Immigration IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Landmark Immigration IPO listing date is on Thursday, January 23, 2025.
